backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, habits, records, monthly targets, and investment goals with access-controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to tracking‑grid behaviors, month-switching rules, and key‑scoping requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected short descriptions of all major frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile initialization, and routing to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: Expandable panel wrapping HabitManager with a collapsible UI control.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component rendering a fallback UI on unhandled errors.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Fatal error screen providing reload and retry options when the app crashes.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Daily tracking grid enforcing month/year filtering, scoped record keys, and completion/amount editing logic.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides UI to create, edit, and delete habits with validation for units, weekly targets, and default amounts.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with user info, theme toggle, logout, and view mode switching between habits and investments.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentGoalCa: Displays an investment goal with progress and dialogs to edit, delete, or log contributions.
Lists investment goals and includes a form for creating new goals with basic validation.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Shows a login page using Internet Identity with branding and a login button.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Lets users view and edit monthly habit targets, using auto-plan defaults and persisted overrides.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Provides horizontally scrollable tabs for selecting months.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a profile setup form allowing users to enter and save their name via a mutation and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Generates monthly habit progress visuals including pie, line, and volume charts, with habit selection and lifetime data integration.
frontend/src/components/ReportExportDial: Provides a dialog for exporting habit data to CSV with date range selection, habit filtering, and mutation-based data retrieval.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard that manages view mode, loads habits and records, and displays habit grids, charts, and management panels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, identity storage, status tracking, and session management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, habits, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark theme colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses human‑readable duration strings to seconds and formats seconds back to readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Builds export filenames based on date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Helpers for labeling, creating, and checking habit unit types.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Generates downloadable CSV reports from export data.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Converts dates to UTC components and formats UTC dates for reporting.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder for PDF report utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Computes completion, daily, and volume statistics for habits over a date range.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements and issues for fixing month‑separated daily‑tracker data persistence and rendering behavior.
